</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from The Slithering</spoilers>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Slithering](/Sources.aspx?ID=41) pg. 60</row>

**Price** 480 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This long, thin _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [wounding](/Equipment.aspx?ID=309) [dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)_ has a smooth edge on one side and a serrated edge on the other. Its [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) comes from slicing away long strips of the target's flesh, and it deals 1d8 persistent bleed damage on a hit instead of 1d6. A creature takes a –2 status penalty to saving throws against [diseases](/Traits.aspx?ID=46) for as long as it has persistent bleed damage from this knife.
